price: Yeroo doonii yaabbatan, amantii Isaaf qulqulleessuun Allaah qofa kadhatu. Yeroo Inni gara dachiitti nagaan isaan baase immoo yeroma san (Rabbitti) qindeessu.
arabic: فَإِذَا رَكِبُواْ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ دَعَوُاْ ٱللَّهَ مُخۡلِصِينَ لَهُ ٱلدِّينَ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰهُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ إِذَا هُمۡ يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā rakibū fī al-ful'ki daʿawū al-laha mukh'liṣīna lahu al-dīna falammā najjāhum ilā al-bari idhā hum yush'rikūna
